price: ߒ ߠߊ߫ ߖߐ߲߭ ߠߎ߬ ߟߊߞߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߞߊ߬ߟߊߡߊ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߒߠߋ ߸ ߡߊ߬ߞߕߏ߬ߟߊ ߟߋ߬ ߒߠߋ ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߤߌߣߟߊ ߟߋ߬ ߒ ߘߌ߫
arabic: ۞ نَبِّئۡ عِبَادِيٓ أَنِّيٓ أَنَا ٱلۡغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: nabbi ʿibādī annī anā al-ghafūru al-raḥīmu
